dcterms:description: A dataset used for audio-visual source localization, containing paired audio clips and visual frames, which helps in training models to accurately locate sound sources in visual scenes.
dcterms:title: Flickr-SoundNet

Weidi Xie

dcterms:description: A large-scale audio-visual dataset designed for sound source localization, containing a variety of audio-visual pairs to facilitate research in this area.
dcterms:title: VGG Sound Source

dcterms:description: A dataset that includes audio-visual pairs for solo music performances, aimed at enhancing the understanding of sound localization in visual contexts.
dcterms:title: MUSIC-solo

dcterms:description: A dataset that includes audio-visual pairs for duet music performances, aimed at enhancing the understanding of sound localization in visual contexts.

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset designed for audio-visual source localization, containing mixed audio-visual pairs to facilitate research in this area.
